profile.title: Personal Profile
profile.text: I am a Full-stack developer specialized in Front-end, with experience in JavaScriptframeworks like React, NextJs and Vue. I have experience developing web3 solutions.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Position as frontend developer in charge of implementing web3 applications in different technologies (React, NextJs, Vue).

tasks.title: The main tasks include:
list: Development of new functionalities in web3 applications.
Display and modify cryptocurrency data through REST services.
Design and implementation of user interface components that interact with the blockchain and smart contracts.
Help analysis and provide possible solutions when developing new features.
Assist new team members with onboarding, code base and local deployment.
Deployment and continuous integration of web applications using services such as Vercel or AWS.
Development with server-side rendering and SEO optimization.
